verbose_text: However, flavopiridol treatment caused significant growth inhibition at 500 (P = 0.018) and 1000 nM (P < 0.001) when compared to the control at 24 h. Treatment for 48 and 72 h significantly decreased the cell viability of the population at 300, 500 and 1000 nM (P < 0.001) (XREF_FIG).
evidence: flavopiridol treatment caused significant growth inhibition at 500 (P=0.018) and 1000 nM (P<0.001) when compared to the control at 24 h. Treatment for 48 and 72 h significantly decreased the cell viability
